```{r styling, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Add some custom CSS styling to the cards
tags$style("
  .title {
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  h1 {
    text-align: center; font-size: 30px;
  }
  
  h2 {
    text-align: center;
  }


  a {
    text-align: center;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 30px;
  }

  button:hover, a:hover {
    opacity: 0.7;
  }
  
  /* Style the card container */
  .card_right_slide {
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 0px;
    max-width: 100%;
    max-height:auto;
    margin: auto;
    text-align: center;
    font-family: arial;
    border-radius: 10px;
    overflow: hidden;
    border-top: 2px solid rgba(143, 151, 121, 0.5);
    background: inherit;
  }
  
  .card_left_slide {
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 0px;
    max-width: 100%;
    max-height:auto;
    margin: auto;
    text-align: center;
    font-family: arial;
    border-radius: 10px;
    overflow: hidden;
    border-top: 2px solid rgba(143, 151, 121, 0.5);
    background: inherit;
  }

  /* Style the card header */
  .card-header {
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: inherit;
    text-align: center;
    font-family: arial;
    font-size: 30px;
    font-weight: bold;
    border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(143, 151, 121, 0.8);
  }
  
  
  
  
  
  

  /* Style the card image */
  .card-image {
    width: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }

  /* Style the card text */
  .card-text {
    color: grey90;
    font-size: 30px;
    position: relative;
    background-color: inherit;
    opacity: 0.8;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }
  
  /* Style button*/
  button {
    outline: 0;
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 8px;
    text-align: center;
    cursor: pointer;
    max-width: 60%;
    font-size: 30px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    border: none;
    border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(143, 151, 121, 1);
    margin-left: 20%;
    margin-right: 20%;
    text-color: grey90;
  }
  
  /* Container holding the image and the text */
  .container {
    position: relative;
    text-align: center;
    color: inherit;
    object-fit: fill;
    max-width: 100%;
    max-height:auto;
    margin: auto;
  }

  /* Top left text */
  .top-left {
    position: absolute;
    max-top: 100px;
    max-left: 205px;
    max-right: 200px;
    min-bottom: 100px;
    color: grey90;
    font-size: 30px;
    background-color: inherit;
    opacity: 0.8;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }
")
```

# Mission and Vision

```{r mission_vision, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Render the mission and vision cards
mission_vision_card = list(
  # Mission
  list(
    body1 = card_body(
      # Add a div tag for the card text
      htmltools::tags$div(
        "Our Mission",
        style = "font-size:30px; font-color: ; text-align: center; font-weight: bold;")),
    
    body2 = card_body(

      # Add a div tag for the card text
      htmltools::tags$div(
        "Fullstack R for Enterprise and Research",
        class = "card-text",
        style = "text-align: center;"))
    ),
  
  # Vision
  list(
    body1 = card_body(
      # Add a div tag for the card text
      htmltools::tags$div(
        "Our Vision",
        style = "font-size:30px; font-color: ; text-align: center; font-weight: bold;")),
    
    body2 = card_body(

      # Add a div tag for the card text
      htmltools::tags$div(
        class = "card-text",
        
        "Fullstack R for Enterprise and Research",
        class = "title",
            style = "text-align: center;"))
    )
)

# Render the slideshow
htmltools::browsable(
  tags$html(
    tags$head(
      # Use Bootstrap 5
      tags$link(
        rel = "stylesheet",
        href = "https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/5.0.0-alpha1/css/bootstrap.min.css"
      )
    ),
    
    tags$body(
      slideshow_right_slide(mission_vision_card, slide_id = "mission_vision_slide"),
      # Add some custom CSS for the animations
      card_animation_slide()
    )
  )
)
```

# Testimonials

```{r testimonials, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Render the mission and vision cards
testimonials_cards = list(
  # card 1
  list(
    body1 = card_body(
      # Add a div tag for the card text
      tags$a(
        href = "https://canarytourske.onrender.com",
    
        htmltools::tags$img(
        src = "./pages/images/testimonials/canary_tours_logo.jpeg"))),
    
    body2 = card_body(
      # Add a div tag for the card text
      htmltools::tags$div(
        "Feedback",
        class = "card-text",
        style = "text-align: center;"))),
  
  # card 2
  list(
    body1 = card_body(
      # Add a div tag for the card text
      tags$a(
        href = "https://canarytourske.onrender.com",
      
        htmltools::tags$img(
        src = "./pages/images/testimonials/canary_tours_logo.jpeg"))),
    
    body2 = card_body(
      # Add a div tag for the card text
      htmltools::tags$div(
        "Feedback 2",
        class = "card-text",
        style = "text-align: center;"))
    )
)

# Render the slideshow
htmltools::browsable(
  tags$html(
    tags$head(
      # Use Bootstrap 5
      tags$link(
        rel = "stylesheet",
        href = "https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/5.0.0-alpha1/css/bootstrap.min.css"
      )
    ),
    
    tags$body(
      tags$div(
    id = "slideshow-testimonials_slide",
    class = "carousel slide",
    `data-bs-ride` = "carousel",
    tags$div(
      class = "carousel-inner",
      lapply(seq_along(testimonials_cards), function(i) {
        tags$div(
          class = ifelse(i == 1, "carousel-item active", "carousel-item"),
          card_left_slide(testimonials_cards[[i]])
        )
      })
    )
  ),
      # Add some custom CSS for the animations
      card_animation_slide()
    )
  )
)

```
